definition: a city in Hunan province
name of a district in Hunan
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Chenzhou prefecture-level city in Hunan

sentences.english: Are you in Chenzhou or Hengyang at the moment?
sentences.chinese: 你現在在郴州還是在衡陽？

sentences.english: Last night he walked to Chenzhou finally but he lost the contact with her.
sentences.chinese: 昨天傍晚，他終於走到了郴州，卻與女友失去了聯繫。

sentences.english: Fish is imported from Dongjiang Reservoir in Chenzhou.
sentences.chinese: 魚類就是從郴州的東江水庫進口。

sentences.english: The general conditions and layout character of the Chenzhou railway station in the Beijing-Guangzhou railway line are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了位於京廣線上郴州站的車站概況及佈局特點。

sentences.english: Feitian Mountain a provicial level holiday resort 20 Kms away from the urban city belongs to typical Danxian Land scape.
sentences.chinese: 郴州城北20公里，有一處名叫飛天山的風景旅遊區。

sentences.english: At 6 of Yesterday Afternoon, Du came to Chenzhou in the end.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午6時許，杜登勇終於走到了郴州。
